# PngMetadata.FindFirstIndex method

Finds the first chunk with the specified type in the PNG metadata.

```csharp
public int FindFirstIndex(ChunkType chunkType)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| chunkType | The chunk type to find. |

## Return Value

Returns the index of the first chunk with the specified type, or `-1` if it was not found.
